definition: (thermodynamics) a thermodynamic quantity equal to the internal energy of a system plus the product of its volume and pressure
details:
noun
- (thermodynamics) a thermodynamic quantity equal to the internal energy of a system plus the product of its volume and pressure
= example: (thermodynamics) a thermodynamic quantity equal to the internal energy of a system plus the product of its volume and pressure
= synonyms: heat content
